summary: Makes Ulfric Stormcloak resemble his voice actor, Vladimir Kulich
descriptionHtml:
[b]NEW (17/2/2013)[/b]

I just started playing Skyrim again and I decided I was unhappy with the old look, so I remade it using RaceMenu by Expired, XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement by Xenius and AOF Believable Hair by AnOldFriend. I do not know whether or not you need the aforementioned mods to use the new version, but there is absolutely no point in [i]not[/i] having them. 

If anyone wants to use this is their own mods, go right ahead.

[b][i]Mods used[/i][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29624]RaceMenu by Expired[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2356]XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement by Xenius[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4307]AOF Believable Hair by AnOldFriend[/url]

-----------------------------------

Here\'s a half-arsed attempt at making Ulfric Stormcloak look like his voice actor, Vladimir Kulich, specifically Kulich\'s character in Ironclad. I\'m reasonably happy with how it turned out, myself. I also increased his size (scale 1.05), since Kulich is 6\'5\" in real life.

Thanks to Bethesda for making a brilliant game, and to Vladimir Kulich for looking totally badass.
author: Aklis
